FuncDef: This command configures the rate for Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) redirect messages issued on the router interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of ICMP redirect messages to send. This parameter must be specified with the second parameter. Values-10 to 1000.
Specifies the time frame in seconds used to limit the number of ICMP redirect messages that can be issued. Values-1 to 60.
